me.shoutto.sdk

Class Shout

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.shoutto.sdk.StmBaseEntity
      • me.shoutto.sdk.Shout

  • public class Shout
extends StmBaseEntity
    This class represents a Shout to Me Shout object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BASE_ENDPOINT
      The base endpoint of shouts on the Shout to Me REST API.

      The key used for JSON serialization of conversation objects.

        This method is called internally to create a Shout object following a successful HTTP POST.
        Parameters:
        stmService - The StmService used for context.
        json - The JSONObject from the response.

      • delete

        public void delete(StmCallback<java.lang.String> stmCallback)
        Sends a request to the Shout to Me REST API to delete the Shout. Generally used as a way for the user to take back a newly created Shout.
        Parameters:
        stmCallback - The callback to be executed or null.
